name: Micrometer Metrics
short_description: Enables Micrometer metrics in your Ktor server application.

documentation.description: The [MicrometerMetrics](https://ktor.io/docs/micrometer-metrics.html) plugin enables `Micrometer` metrics in your Ktor server application and allows you to choose the required monitoring system, such as Prometheus, JMX, Elastic, and so on. By default, Ktor exposes metrics for monitoring HTTP requests and a set of low-level metrics for monitoring the JVM. You can customize these metrics or create new ones.
